verses.name: Ezekiel 37:16
verses.text: Moreover, thou son of man, take thee one stick, and write upon it, For Judah, and for the children of Israel his companions: then take another stick, and write upon it, For Joseph, the stick of Ephraim, and for all the house of Israel his companions:

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:17
verses.text: And join them one to another into one stick; and they shall become one in thine hand.

verses.name: Ezekiel 37:18
verses.text: And when the children of thy people shall speak unto thee, saying, Wilt thou not shew us what thou meanest by these?
